FuncDef:
The ma command creates an MA and displays the MA view.
The undo ma command deletes an MA.
By default, no MA is created in MD.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MA. Different MAs in an MD cannot have the same name.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters. Question marks (?) are not supported. The total length of MA and MD names must be no greater than 44 characters.

Indicates the format of the MA name carried in CCMs to be sent. The default format is string.
-

Specifies an ICC-based MA name carried in CCMs to be sent. ITU carrier codes (ICCs) are assigned to network carriers or service providers and maintained by ITU-T Telecommunication Standardization Bureau (TSB) in compliance with ITU-T M.1400 Recommendation.
The value is a string of 1 to 13 case-sensitive characters. Question marks (?) are not supported.

Specifies a string-based MA name carried in CCMs to be sent.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters. Question marks (?) are not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The ma command can be used to configure an MA. CFM can be configured on devices in the MA to monitor link connectivity when services are deployed based on VLANs or VSIs.
Prerequisites
An MD has been configured using the cfm md command.
